title: What happened to Mandrake Ward?
body: Did something happen to mandrake ward? I haven't heard too much about it for a while, has it been abandoned or is it just in hiatus for now?

replies.body: Nothing's been done with it at the moment. It was an experiment into different ways of offering vision/map awareness with the assumption going in being that we probably wouldn't ship it. We do a fair bit of experimental testing like that, though most of it doesn't end up on the PBE, since development time's often more of a limitation than lack of feedback.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JdEv84lk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-15T21:04:50.424+0000)

> Nothing's been done with it at the moment. It was an experiment into different ways of offering vision/map awareness with the assumption going in being that we probably wouldn't ship it. We do a fair bit of experimental testing like that, though most of it doesn't end up on the PBE, since development time's often more of a limitation than lack of feedback.

So...do you guys have any plans to balance Evelynn's stealth then, or are you just moving on to other higher priority projects?

> [{quoted}](name=NeoSeraphi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JdEv84lk,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-08-15T21:52:44.575+0000)
>
> So...do you guys have any plans to balance Evelynn's stealth then, or are you just moving on to other higher priority projects?

There's already an exploit you can use to reveal Eve with vision wards + green wards without her knowing she was revealed, and it has been around for at least an entire season (possibly YEARS).

You pop a vision ward on one side of a wall, and a green ward on the other side of the wall, and the green ward will reveal her.

tbh you have no right to complain about Eve when this bug/exploit exists.
